title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the second row should remain intact. The Launch item should not be moved to the first row.
SR:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (the last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (the last coolItem on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (the last coolItem on the first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.
   - Verify that the first item on the second row is deleted.
   - Verify that the second row is not removed and remains intact.
